function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Laboratory testing during the early phase of the epidemic was critical","Impact":"Improves identification of cases and facilitates early containment","Mitigation":"Increase access to widespread and efficient laboratory testing","Technologies":"PCR testing, rapid antigen testing","People":"Public at risk of delayed containment measures, healthcare workers at risk of exposure","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, government health agencies"},{"Description":"Mobility out of Wuhan remained the main driver of spread before the cordon sanitaire","Impact":"Increased transmission of the virus to other provinces and regions","Mitigation":"Enforce travel restrictions, implement quarantine measures for travelers from affected areas","Technologies":"Digital contact tracing, travel surveillance systems","People":"Travelers from Wuhan, residents of other provinces at risk of exposure","Owner":"Government agencies, immigration and border control authorities"},{"Description":"Scant travel history information for some provinces (e.g., Zhejiang and Guangdong)","Impact":"Limitations in tracking and controlling the spread of the virus","Mitigation":"Improve data collection and reporting mechanisms, invest in comprehensive travel history tracking systems","Technologies":"Digital case reporting platforms, integrated travel history databases","People":"Public at risk of incomplete contact tracing, healthcare workers at risk of exposure to untracked cases","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, government health agencies"}]}
